item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Detection Systems (Fwd and Aft) Detectors –Configurations Without -136 or Later AFOLTS Card (M10427 in P-54 Card File)

remarks.para: One in each compartment may be inoperative provided remaining detector is verified to be operative before each departure.

numlitem.para: Ensure affected system FWD and AFT CARGO FIRE WARNING Lights illuminate, FWD and AFT CARGO FIRE message displays on top EICAS, and red FIRE Light illuminates on Discreet Warning Panel.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected CARGO FIRE Light "FWD OR AFT CARGO - ONE SMOKE DET INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
